page.title: 17A CLITHEROE MUM'S DAY
page.content: My mum's day starts when my dad brings her a cup of tea. My mum then gets me up, makes my breakfast and prepares my packed lunch, then sees me off to school. She then washes the pots from breakfast, makes the beds and tidies my bedroom. After she has loaded the washer with dirty clothes, she hoovers and polishes around the house. At about 12.30 p.m. she has her lunch which lasts between half an hour and one hour depending on how busy she is. When lunch is over, she takes our dog Sue out for a walk then goes into town to do some shopping but she is always home for when I get home from school at 4.00 p.m. After we have washed up after tea she sits down to watch the news. Quite often she has meetings to attend. At about 11.00 p.m. she goes to bed.
